result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil

result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndoṁan nua anois a ḃuíoċas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórṫa eile naċ ḃfuil ann níos mó ċun é a ḟeiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.eng: The horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ga: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.orig: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibh
result.html: Na huafáis a chonaiceamar uafáis nach n-oireann focla dóibhThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.
result.ponchtml: Na huafáis a ċonaiceamar uafáis naċ n-oireann focla dóiḃThe horrors we've seen, horrors words can't describe.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: The brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ga: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.orig: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.html: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ponchtml: Éilíonn gontaċt na formáide 140 caraċtar naċ dtéann an scríḃneoir ċun fadála ina ċuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ga: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.orig: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.html: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthiLaughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ponchtml: Ag déanaṁ gáire naċ raiḃ a ḟonn uirṫiLaughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: You will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh air
result.html: Gheobhaidh tusa rud nach dearn tú margadh airYou will get something you didn't bargain for!
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tusa rud naċ dearn tú margaḋ airYou will get something you didn't bargain for!

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: Pursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ga: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.orig: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici do
result.html: A dh'iarraidh mná nach raibh toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.
result.ponchtml: A ḋ'iarraiḋ mná naċ raiḃ toil aici doPursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.html: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigríchYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: Wasn't he man enough?
result.ga: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.orig: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.html: Nach raibh go leor den fhear annWasn't he man enough?
result.ponchtml: Naċ raiḃ go leor den ḟear annWasn't he man enough?

result.eng: Then he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ga: Ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
